markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: A personal blogging site, built with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Bootstrap 4 and jQuery. This includes an authentication system built using passport.js, a RESTful blog posting and comments posting API, authorisation levels for managing blog posts and more. | Home | Preview | | :----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------: | :-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------: | | ![Home-preview](https://github.com/Tymotex/CS-Nexus/raw/master/public/cs-home-preview.gif) | ![Site-preview](https://github.com/Tymotex/CS-Nexus/raw/master/public/cs-nexus-preview.gif) | This project also implements a set of endpoints for the companion Raspberry Pi project here to post data snapshots.
